name: Taverna astronomy plugin collection
body:
### Outline.
This project aims to join efforts toward the use of scientific workflows in astronomy. In particular, we are developing Taverna plugins to improve the astronomer experience with [Taverna workbench](http://www.taverna.org.uk/).
Currently, there are two main contributions:
* [AstroTaverna plugin]().
* [VAMDC plugin](http://vamdc.mssl.ucl.ac.uk/taverna/vamdc/).

###Installation

To install the plugins to Taverna:

* Download and install Taverna 2.4
* Start Taverna
* Add a plugin site: http://julian-garrido.github.com/TavernaAstronomyPluginCollection/ 
* Restart Taverna


### Astrotaverna
[AstroTaverna](http://asterisk.apod.com/viewtopic.php?f=35&t=31653) is a plugin for Taverna Workbench that provides the means to build astronomy workflows using Virtual Observatory services discovery and efficient manipulation of VOTables (based on STIL tool set). It integrates SAMP-enabled software, allowing data exchange and communication among local VO tools, as well as the ability to execute Aladin scripts and macros. 

For more information, watch our [video tutorial](http://vimeo.com/51095004) or go to the [AstroTaverna starter pack](http://www.myexperiment.org/packs/420.html) that includes a compilation of examples with example input data and descriptions.

AstroTaverna is maintained by [wf4ever](https://github.com/wf4ever)
####History
Version 1.09
* Configuration of PDL artifact to work with PDL server, rest services, and extended descriptions for rest services that returns VOTables.
* Solve bug parsing paths in Aladin scripts and macros under Windows platform.
Version 1.08
* Update names and descriptions of services.
* Include Aladin script and macro artifacts.

### VAMDC
VAMDC has integrated plugins into the Taverna Workflow System to run XSAMS Queries, and particular Codes of the VAMDC. 

VAMDC plugin is maintained by [VAMDC](https://github.com/VAMDC)

#### History
Version 2.4.0:
* Update for new release of Taverna 2.4.
